actions.recommendation: Colonoscopy: At the age of 50, we recommend a screening colonoscopy and gastroscopy to detect any changes that present a future risk for cancer. An annual bone density screen for osteoporosis is recommended from age 50. Abdominal ultrasound is recommended for elevated liver enzymes.
Visit a general practitioner or a gynaecologists for a Pap smear and a Radiologist for a mammogram

Losing weight, particularly abdominal fat, can have great overall health benefits. Focus on whole, real, unprocessed foods, practice good sleep hygiene, and try to manage your stress as poor sleep and chronic stress are associated with weight gain.
Recovering from spinal surgery, currently has cold symptoms
Exercise regularly to maintain a healthy weight and reduce the risk of chronic diseases.
Quit smoking to improve overall health and reduce the risk of various diseases.
Maintain a balanced diet to support overall health and well-being.
Manage stress through relaxation techniques, exercise, or therapy to improve overall health and well-being.
Get enough sleep each night for optimal health and well-being.
